other_tests.findings: Extensive wall thickening involving the cecum and proximal-to-mid ascending colon with surrounding fat stranding, suggesting possible diverticulitis with mircoperforation versus colitis. Small bowel is unremarkable except for markedly thickened distal most portion of the terminal ileum. A large left inguinal hernia containing fat and loops of distal descending and sigmoid colon without signs of strangulation. Mild enlargement of spleen and mild coronary artery calcifications.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Stable gynecomastia compared to a previous CT.

other_tests.findings: Signs of tachycardia, distant heart sounds, diffuse tenderness in the abdomen predominantly in RLQ, and chronic venous stasis changes in extremities.
